name: ax12wlem
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1
body: |- wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w0, wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0))))

body.origin:
|- wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w0, wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0))))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))
-| wi(w1, wal(s0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w0, wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0))))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))
-| wi(w1, wal(s0, w1))

|- wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w0, wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0))))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))
-| diffsw(s0, w1)

comment: Lemma for weak version of ~ ax-12 . Uses only Tarski's FOL axiom schemes. In some cases, this lemma may lead to shorter proofs than ~ ax12w . (Contributed by NM, 10-Apr-2017.)
